Detailed Description

Model object for books.

Book objects represent printed publications that I have read.

Definition at line 10 of file book.php.

Member Function Documentation

Book::permalink (  ) 

Creates a permalink anchor for this book.

This method should be refactored to make use of the canonical relative_url / permalink pair.
